verses.roman:
bhojane vasite raghunāthe kahe sarva-jana
paṇḍita kahe,--iṅha pāche karibe bhojana'

synonyms: bhojane—to eat; vasite—to sit down; raghunāthe—unto Raghunātha dāsa; kahe—requested; sarva-jana—everyone; paṇḍita kahe—Rāghava Paṇḍita said; iṅha—this; pāche—later; karibe bhojana—will take food.
translation: All the devotees present requested Raghunātha dāsa to sit down and take prasāda, but Rāghava Paṇḍita told them,"He will take prasāda later."
